alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth; McPherson; Rice; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 2:22PM CDT until May 09 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern McPherson County in central Kansas... Northeastern Rice County in central Kansas... Southeastern Ellsworth County in central Kansas... Southwestern Saline County in central Kansas... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 222 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kanopolis, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ellsworth, Kanopolis, Marquette, Geneseo, Brookville, Lorraine, Falun, Frederick, Kanopolis Lake, Kanopolis State Park and Ellsworth Airport. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
